title: .NET 9 Migration Completed
details:
Successfully migrated the Notebook Automation project from .NET 8 to .NET 9.

## Changes Made:
1. Updated TargetFramework from `net8.0` to `net9.0` in all project files:
   - NotebookAutomation.Core.csproj
   - NotebookAutomation.Cli.csproj
   - NotebookAutomation.Tests.csproj
   - NotebookAutomation.Core.Tests.csproj
   - NotebookAutomation.Cli.Tests.csproj

2. Updated LangVersion from `12` to `13` to support C# 13 features in .NET 9

## Verification:
- ✅ All projects build successfully with .NET 9
- ✅ All 775 tests pass (3 skipped)
- ✅ CLI application runs correctly and shows ".NET Runtime: 9.0.5"
- ✅ No breaking changes or compatibility issues found

## Environment:
- .NET SDK: 10.0.100-preview.5.25277.114 (preview)
- .NET Runtime: 9.0.5 (stable)
- C# Language Version: 13

This migration enables the project to use the latest stable .NET runtime and C# 13 language features.
